timeline.bodyText: removing final should be enough, why does serializerFor need to be public?
timeline.author: vbekiaris

replies.bodyText: as discussed, serializerFor methods need to be public to be used by the delegating serialization service on Jet side.
replies.author: vbekiaris

timeline.author: vbekiaris

timeline.bodyText: instead of changing visibility of constructor maybe you can make the static factory method SerializationUtil#createSerializerAdapter public and client code on Jet side can work on SerializerAdapter interface?
timeline.author: vbekiaris

timeline.bodyText: no need for this to be public as discussed
timeline.author: vbekiaris
